page.title: 18BEDLINGTON AREA COURIER-Pt 1
page.content: The Courier is a free local paper which serves the houses in our block.It is delivered to over 100,000 homes each week and is twenty pages in length.Advertising appears on every page and the following comments apply in particular to the July 18th edition. Nine pages have advertising only, the main clients being Hintons, Kushum Bag Tandoori Take-Away, Carpet Discount Centre, and ATS Tyre Service. None of these were full page advertisers the following week. The front page story concerns a discovery of asbestos at Stannington Children's Hospital resulting in its closure.Page 3 is a picture feature on the Wansbeck Show and improvements to the ambulance service provide the main story on page 4. {MORE IN Pt 2}
